title: Surcotto HB Pencils, 30 Pre-Sharpened Triangular Pencils with Eraser and Sharpener for Children's Writing and Drawing at School and Home - Blue, Green, Pink, Purple
features: Surcotto HB Pencils: Set of 30 premium HB graphite pencils with Rubbers on the end. Enough quantity to meet your daily use and replacement. We will also provide you with a free eraser and sharpener.

Ergonomic triangular shape: With three wide edges and the non-slip dotted grip area. It is easy to use for the kindergartner with a small hand and a lack of finesse. The ergonomic shape makes writing fatigue-free and is suitable for children who need to practice writing. Universal for left and right-handed people.

Unique colour design for better concentration：There are 30 pencils in 5 different contrasting colours (blue pink green yellow purple), 6 of each colour. The use of the various colours quickly attracts the child's attention and helps them to learn and remember better.

Premium quality: Our pencils are made of premium materials, special craftsmanship, easy to sharpen and erase. Lead core with reliable break resistance, non-toxic and non-irritating odor, comply with EU EN-71 certification.
Wide range of use: a truly professional set of pencils designed for drawing and writing for school, class and everyday use. And of course the ideal gift for Christmas, birthdays or New Year, etc.
description: Product Description Premium HB graphite pencils-New Package ！ Ergonomic triangular HB pencils With its three wide edges and non-slip dotted grip area, this pencil is easy for kindergartners with small hands and developing fine motor skills to use. With Rubbers on the end Our pencils come equipped with their own erasers on the end, so you don't have to worry about forgetting yours during an exam or losing it in your backpack. With a free eraser and sharpener In addition, we'll include a complimentary eraser and a compact, portable pencil sharpener with your purchase. A set of 30 pencils - New Package ！ Our newly upgraded packaging not only provides convenient storage but also minimizes the space occupied by the product. This allows for more room in your backpack or drawer. Additionally, the different packaging designs offer you the flexibility to choose according to your preference. High-quality pencil lead This pencil lead writes very smoothly and does not produce any lag or resistance. It is also highly durable and does not break frequently when sharpening. Moreover, it has excellent color performance. Five different colors The set includes five colors: blue, pink, green, yellow, and purple, with six pencils of each color. The length of each pencil is 18.8cm. Stylish and vibrant exterior design The use of a variety of colors can quickly capture children's attention, making it easier for them to learn and remember information. And our pencils come Pre-sharpened, making them convenient for immediate use upon receiving your shipment. Designed specifically for drawing and writing in school, classroom, and everyday settings! Caution: Not suitable for children under 2 years old. Do not bite the pencil lead with your teeth. Package includes: HB graphite pencils × 30 Free eraser × 1 Free pencil sharpener × 1 We promise to take responsibility for any issues that may arise with our products. If you have any questions about our products, we will do our best to help you resolve them.
